CustomField.description: Field for AE to paste confirmation of payment. This can be the either the DocuSign envelope ID or the FastSpring ID.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Before winning the opportunity you need to provide one of the following: - For invoices that have been paid please provide the order ID. For example: GEA123123-1231-12312 - For customers who have agreed Net terms, please provide the Docusign envelope ID. Additionally make sure to fill in the payment information of the opportunity and set a task for a Sales Admin to follow up. https://www.notion.so/gearset/Opportunity-Win-conditions-01b3a911fb4b4e37a098a70f38b4a4e2
